supplier_of: nurseries | fruit trees | mangos | guavas | papaya
information: Over 25 years' experience in growing avocado, mango and other types of fruit trees. BROKAW ESPAÑA, S.L. is a nursery for tropical fruit trees in the Vélez-Málaga valley, in southern Spain, specialised in the production of avocado plants and mango trees for the Southern European and North American markets. Brokaw España, S.L. provides the latest models and international commercial varieties in order to provide our customers the best products.
